extendedIngredients.name: almonds
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 cup finely chopped almonds, toasted, divided

extendedIngredients.name: fudge ice cream topping
extendedIngredients.originalString: 3/4 cup hot fudge ice cream topping

recipes.title: Almond Fudge Pops
recipes.instructions: Directions                                                                                In a bowl, beat the topping mix, milk and vanilla on low speed until blended. Beat on high until soft peaks form, about 4 minutes.                                                                                            In a large bowl, combine the fudge topping and water; fold in the topping mixture and 1/2 cup almonds.                                                                                           Pour into plastic cups. Cover with heavy-duty foil; insert sticks through foil. Place in a 9-in. square pan. Freeze until firm. Remove foil and cups. Roll the frozen pops in remaining almonds.                                        Yield: 6 servings.                                                                                                                         Originally published as Almond Fudge Pops in  Taste of HomeJune/July 2003, p41                                                                                                                                                                                                        Nutritional Facts                                                                             1 serving (1 each) equals 305 calories, 15 g fat (3 g saturated fat), 3 mg cholesterol, 60 mg sodium, 34 g carbohydrate, 4 g fiber, 7 g protein.                                                                                                                                                                     Print                                                                                    Add to Recipe Box                            Email a Friend

steps.step: In a bowl, beat the topping mix, milk and vanilla on low speed until blended. Beat on high until soft peaks form, about 4 minutes.
In a large bowl, combine the fudge topping and water; fold in the topping mixture and 1/2 cup almonds.
Pour into plastic cups. Cover with heavy-duty foil; insert sticks through foil.
Place in a 9-in. square pan. Freeze until firm.
Roll the frozen pops in remaining almonds.
